title: Books
text:
The Dreamers






FANTASY


SCIFI



The novel revolves around Sol, who lives in a Post-Disaster world that nearly wiped out all life on Earth. This world is overseen by ‚ÄúThe Savior,‚Äù sent by the Deity to save the remaining humans from their fate and eradicate evil from the world. Sol, like the other obedient servants of the deity, worked tirelessly, awaiting his reward in the ‚ÄúHouses of Rest.‚Äù But then came the dream‚Ä¶ A strange dream that turned his life upside down and set Sol on the path of his journey into the unknown world beyond the city borders to discover his true self and the truth about ‚ÄúThe Dreamers.‚Äù This fantasy novel raises many important questions that come to life in Sol‚Äôs adventurous journey and the choices he makes. What is reality? Is it separate from our selves or deeply connected to them? What is truth and what is falsehood? When do we become free, and when do we turn into mere slaves? And where do the boundaries of humanity lie?





15 Mar 2025


Ahmed Elmokadem












Numbers that Dazzled the World






NUMBERS


PHILOSOPHY


MATH


HISTORY



This book takes readers on a captivating journey through the history and significance of extraordinary numbers that have shaped human thought and understanding. From the ancient civilizations that first counted and measured, to modern scientists decoding the cosmos, this book explores the profound impact of numbers on science, philosophy, literature, and society. Delving into the stories behind these remarkable numbers, the book reveals their mysteries, the struggles of those who discovered them, and their lasting influence on our world. Whether you are a student, a professional, or simply curious, this book invites you to uncover the magic of numbers and gain a deeper appreciation for their role in our lives and the universe.





15 Mar 2025


Ahmed Elmokadem

title: Ahmed Elmokadem
text: Opinions expressed on this Site are the author‚Äôs own in his personal capacity. They do not reflect the views of any organization, company, or board he is associated with.

title: Welcome to My Blog
text:
Hello and welcome to my little corner of the internet! I‚Äôm thrilled to have you here. This blog is a space where my passion for discussions and good debates comes to life. Whether you‚Äôre a curious mind, a seasoned debater, or just someone looking for interesting reads, there‚Äôs something here for you.
We‚Äôll dive into a wide range of topics, from the latest scientific discoveries to deep philosophical questions. We‚Äôll explore the intricacies of political landscapes and, yes, even venture into the often controversial and confrontational realms of religion and politics. (Because who doesn‚Äôt love a good debate that can potentially end friendships, right? üòâ)
But this blog isn‚Äôt just about my thoughts and opinions. I want to hear from you! Use the comments section to provide feedback, engage in discussions, or suggest topics you‚Äôd like to see covered. Your input is invaluable and will help shape the direction of this blog.
So, grab a cup of coffee, get comfortable, and let‚Äôs embark on this journey of exploration and debate together. I can‚Äôt wait to see where our conversations will take us!
Happy reading and debating!

title: Ahmed Elmokadem
text:
Download my CV
I am a passionate Pharmacometrician and Senior Scientist with a deep love for science and science communication. I hold a PhD in Biomedical Sciences from the University of Connecticut. My research includes pharmacometric modeling and simulation across various therapeutic areas such as cancer, diabetes, and COVID-19. My work employs diverse techniques including Quantitative Systems Pharmacology (QSP), Physiologically-Based Pharmacokinetics (PBPK), Bayesian inference, and machine learning.
I am proficient in programming languages such as Julia and R, which I use extensively in my research and modeling work. Beyond my professional expertise, I am deeply interested in the intersection of science, philosophy, and religion, and how these fields can inform and enrich each other. Additionally, I have a strong interest in mathematics, its history, and its profound impact on daily lives and human civilization. I am fascinated by how mathematical principles and numbers shape our world and contribute to solving complex scientific problems.
I am also an author of both fiction and nonfiction, with two books published in Arabic and currently in the process of publishing them in English. My writing reflects my passion for science and my desire to communicate complex ideas in an accessible and engaging way.

title: Ahmed Elmokadem
text:
Key research interests

Pharmacometrics: Quantitative systems pharmacology (QSP), physiologically based pharmacokinetics (PBPK), population pharmacokinetics/pharmacodynamics (PKPD), Bayesian hierarchical PKPD modeling, merging pharmacometrics with machine learning

title: Ahmed Elmokadem
text:
Teaching
I serve as an adjunct professor at both the University of Connecticut and Indiana University

title: Ahmed Elmokadem
text:
Personal life
I am a father and a husband who enjoys the routine scientific-philosophical-religious-political discussions with my family. My wife is incredibly supportive and loving, always encouraging me in my pursuits and standing by my side through thick and thin. We share a deep bond and a mutual passion for exploring life‚Äôs big questions together.
Video game time with my son is also something I cherish. It‚Äôs our special way of bonding and having fun, whether we‚Äôre teaming up to conquer virtual worlds or just laughing at our in-game mishaps. These moments are priceless and bring a lot of joy to our lives.
